name: Party Cat!
description:
Be the cool cat of the party. Simple one swipe to get around. Go through the entire room and dance.
One-touch simple controls and addictive gameplay.

Features:
Free to play
Simple fun control
Awesome cat in sunglasses
No wi-fi needed
